settings.title: Shipping and Delivery
settings.text:
Shipping info for US customers only.
Please visit your local region site to ship internationally.

settings.title: Processing Times
settings.answer:
All orders are dispatched within 1-4 business days from the time of ordering.

Our dispatch team operates between business hours Monday - Friday, excluding weekends and public holidays.

We aim to dispatch all orders within 1 business days, however, this may take longer during peak-trade periods. Please note, sale orders are dispatched within 7-10 business days.

As soon as our orders have been dispatched, we will email the relevant tracking details to help monitor the progress of shipping.Â

settings.title: Delivery Times
settings.answer: Please refer to the table below for specific shipping times.

settings.html_content:
Shipping Information
DHL Express Shipping
Cost $25 shipping fee for orders under $200
Free Over Free for orders over $200+
Time 2-4 business days

settings.title: Order Tracking
settings.answer: To track any active orders, please visit: https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home.html

settings.title: Taxes and Duties
settings.answer: Unfortunately, Jo Mercer cannot be held responsible for any custom duties, foreign taxes or other fees which may be enforced in your country. These will remain the responsibility of the customer. Please contact your local customs office for further information.

settings.title: Customer Service
settings.answer:
For any returns, please contact hello@jomercer.com.au.

For any further enquries, please contact visit your local DHL for any queries.

Contact your local DHL service here:

https://mydhl.express.dhl/us/en/home.html

settings.title: Returns
settings.answer: For any returns, please refer to our returns policy here.

settings.title: Sustainability
settings.answer:
At JM, we take our commitment to the planet seriously.

That is why we proudly partner with DHL Express, utilising sustainable aviation fuel (SAF) via the GoGreen Plus service to deliver your orders. By

investing in sustainable aviation fuel, we actively reduce the CO2e emissions associated with our shipments by 10%, minimising our carbon footprint.

settings.title: DELIVERY
settings.content:
We offer free standard shipping on all Australian orders over $140.
We offer free standard shipping on all International orders over $500.
